title: The Seven Mysteries of Teitan Elementary School Case (Remastered)

infobox.Title:: The Seven Mysteries of Teitan Elementary School Case
infobox.Japanese title:: 帝丹小7不思議事件  (Teitan-shō Nana-Fushigi Jiken)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Detective Boys  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri  Sumiko Kobayashi  Ryujiro Uematsu  Toya
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima, Next Conan's Hint  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Yuko Kato as Sumiko Kobayashi  Shigeru Ushiyama as Masayuki Ohata  Toshihiko Nakajima as Asst. principal  Motomu Kiyokawa as Ryujiro Uematsu  Mikiko Enomoto as Fukumoto
infobox.Closing song:: Kōri no Ue ni Tatsu Yō ni

sections.Characters introduced:

- Conan's homeroom teacher
- 59 years old
- Teitan Elementary School principal
- Teitan Elementary School security guard
sections.Situation: The elementary school has had strange things going on at night. The anatomy figure running around, statues appearing to move, dolls showing up in the hall with the students' names, and a missing Vice Principal. The Detective Boys decide they need to sneak in at night to uncover these mysteries, but what they learn could lead to a laugh and to a horrible nightmare.

sections.Remastered version: - A remastered version of this case was aired on September 13, 2014.
